topic.title: The Milk Parlor
topic.shortdesc: The Milk Parlor is the best place to rock out to live music in Blacksburg

image.alt: This is the main stage at the Milk Parlor

li.p: The Milk Parlor is a bar in Blacksburg whose signature drinks are alcoholic milkshakes
They have events all the time, from live music to standup comedy on their main stage
Yet again, at the Milk Parlor I prefer to drink the cheapest beer possible, in this case usually PBR or Corona
The best nights to go to their shows are Fridays or Saturdays, when they have local bands play shows. My favorites are the Red Ferns or, the band I have recently joined, Shock Diamonds
